paymentPurposeCode.description: Holds information related to the SEPA payment purpose codes

definition.description: This indicates a full description of payment purpose code. i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

language.description: Language specific fields will be displayed under this entity

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

classification.description: This indicates a high-level classification of payment purpose code. i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

paymentOrderProduct.description: Payment Features that are specific to a product

rank.description: Indicates the rank of the payment order product within the group.

payThroughBeneficiary.description: Defines whether payment initiation can be done by providing beneficiary details. This is applicable when beneficiary is not within the same bank

futureDate.description: Indicates if a future dated instruction can be inputted for the specific payment order product

requiredCreditValue.description: Indicates if required credit value date can be inputted for the specific payment order product while initiating a payment

IBANSupport.description: Check for payment support for IBAN or not

BICSupport.description: Check for payment support for BIC or not

sortCodeSupport.description: Check for payment support for sortCode or not

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

weblink.description: The web link for additional information

forexSupport.description: Check for payment support for forex or not

defaultChargeOption.description: Indicates the charge option which will be defaulted at the time of payment initiation for specific payment order product i.e. Recipient To Pay All Charges, Pay My Bank's Charges or Pay My Bank Charges Only.

checkTransparency.description: Used to set if simulation is required or not

awaitExternalSubmit.description: External payment request for approval details

debitMainAccountCurrencyCode.description: ISO Currency for Debit Main Account

creditMainAccountCurrencyCode.description: ISO Currency for Credit Main Account

ctrBtrIndicator.description: Indicates Customer transfer (CTR) or Bank transfer (BTR)

date.description: Date in the format YYYYMMDD. E.g. 20191231

transactionReference.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction in the core system

sendersReference.description: Indicates the incoming sender's reference i.e. tag 20 of incoming SWIFT or in case when transaction is received from other system/ application, this can also indicate the reference number of that system/ application

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

receivedAt.description: Indicates the date and time when the record was created in DD MON YYYY HH:MM:SS.MMM format

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

direction.description: Indicates the direction of the Direct debit claim for which mandate is received. The claim can be 'Outward' i.e. Claim is sent to the other bank or 'Inward'  i.e. other bank submit their claim to debit our customer's account.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditMainAccountCompanyID.description: Indicates the credit main account company ID

debitMainAccountCompanyID.description: Indicates the debit main account company ID

postingAndConfirmation.description: Holds the charges applied for a transaction

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

typeOfCharge.description: Indicates the type of fee calculated

feeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code in which the fee will be charged

chargeAmount.description: Indicates the charge amount equivalent in charge account currency

chargeAmountFeeCcy.description: Indicates the charge amount equivalent in fee currency

feeType.description: Indicates the Fee type applied from the PPT.FEETYPE table

chargeAmountCcy.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

fileUploadType.description: Application allows parameters for a type of upload to be defined. These include the upload directory, optional maximum file size limit, and optional extension

uploadDirectory.description: specifies in which directory files will be uploaded to

fileExtension.description: Specifies the upload file extension type. For example CSV, XML or PDF etc.

fileMaximumSize.description: Specifies a maximum size (in bytes) to be uploaded
